body.p: Shakespeare never grows old.He continues to inspire each new generation - Norman J. Lund.

p.s: First of all Shakespeare is timeless.
He wrote about so much topics, topics which are still relevant.
For example in politics, familysfamilies and each generation.
He wrote about human-being, the question you ask yourself and about deciding between opposites for humans.
The importance by Shakespeare plays are the characters.
It is like the characters doesn'tdon't represent a person, they represent more an emotion and everybody in the audience can understand it and can yourself identify with the play.
Shakespeare is not about an old play, it's more about the understanding from humans, the acting and identification.
He has also invented a lot of quotations and basics for the today's English.
So everybody useuses Shakespeare words.
He is famour worldwide and stays known over 500 years.
Everybody knowknows at least one quotation of a play from him.
For example to be or not to be - Hamlet.
On the other hand is Shakespeare really hard to understand and to analyze.
He is way back in the past and not modern.
Some say that his plays aren't relevant today, because they also aren't relevant in the Elizabethan age.
It was more a social interaction for the audience in the theatre globe,like a meeting for the people.
Thanthen is one argument against him that Shakespeare doesn't invent something new in theatre.
His plays based on Greek plays and there isn't something new in his plays.
I think in reference to school is Shakespeare not as much relevant than he is in theatre business.
I think he is more part of English history but don'tdoesn't have to be analyzed.
I think in this generation it is much harder to analyze the language from Shakespeare than other articles.
It doesn't matter if it is worldwide ore only in England.
I think Shakespeare havehas to mentioned in each English class but don't analyze anymore.
But I also think for society and in theatre business he is still relevant.
His topics can be play in so much different interpretation and everytimeevery time the audience can understand it.
I think it will be more a theatre business based on Shakespeare plays, without the classic plays he wrote.
I think it is important to mention him, because he has still today a big influence.
